Texts.Chs: 你可以抓一些^orange;其他种类的蜜蜂^white;，然后互相繁殖它们。这样你的蜜蜂种类才会越来越多。我建议首先你可以尝试到森林寻找蜜蜂！
Texts.Eng: Find ^orange;other types of bees^white;, and cross-breed them within. You never know what you'll end up with! I suggest searching for Forest Bees as soon as possible!

Texts.Chs: 现在你需要抓一些^orange;蜂后和普通蜜蜂^white;，并将它们放置在养蜂场里繁殖。你应该用^orange;捕虫网^reset;来抓它们。蜜蜂在大多数星球上都可以找到。
Texts.Eng: Now you need to ^orange;catch a queen and a drone honey bee^white; and let them loose inside your apiary. You'll need a ^orange;bug net^reset; for this. Bees can be found on most biomes.
